0.text: Bug 114905  The default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modify the default value..

1.text: Description: The default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modify the  default value.

3.text: New a report parameter, set Display type to List Box.

5.text: Input three values: "aa", "bb", "cc", set "aa" as default and click OK 3.

6.text: Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify "aa" to "aaa" and click OK directly  4.

8.text: Change the Display type to Combo Box  Expected result: "aaa" is the default value.

9.text: After step 5, OK button should be gray.

10.text: Actual result: No default value was set.

11.text: After step 5, OK button still can be used.
